promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple bird normal-type pokemon wearing regal gemstones. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemchirp, a a chibi young simple bird normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: White Wind, Turmoil Strike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "normal" or "Gemchirp". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bird-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This petite, gem-toned avian thrives in quaint communities. With a distinct cry, it harnesses the White Wind and channels Turmoil Strike.
